page.title: 18Occupations in Dalton
page.content: We conducted a survey of father's jobs in Dalton C.of.E school.The most popular job for dads is working at Vickers.Vickers is a shipyard where ships, especially submarines are built for the British Navy.Alot of dads work at Bowater Scott which is a paper factory making toilet roll,tissues,and absorbent kitchen paper.A few work at Glaxo which is a chemical factory manufacturing mostly medical produce such as ointment and pills.There are a few shopkeepers.Some fathers work at the hospital but not as a doctor e.g. an administrator,a porter,in the laboratories.Some dads are unemployed. There were very few conpared to the % of unemployed throughout the county.
